thread.title: These Little Kids Were Too Busy Doing the Whip and the Nae Nae to Play Football
thread.title_full: These Little Kids Were Too Busy Doing the Whip and the Nae Nae to Play Football | Complex UK

author: Chris Yuscavage
title: These Little Kids Were Too Busy Doing the Whip and the Nae Nae to Play Football
text:
The rest of us might be tired of watching people do the Whip and the Nae Nae ( sorry, Riley! ), but little kids still can’t get enough of it. If you need proof of that, just watch this video of the Milford Mighty Mites from Milford, Mass. They’re all lined up and ready to run a play when Silento ’s “Watch Me” starts playing and, well, you know what happens next.
Some players—mostly offensive players—continue to play, but the rest of them do the Whip and the Nae Nae and complete ignore their assignments. The result? The easiest touchdown you’ll ever see.
Despite the outcome here, these kids deserve ALL the participation trophies for this amazing performance.
Send all complaints, compliments, and tips to sportstips@complex.com .
[ via SB Nation ]
